properties.Name: CustomerPeriodExtendedCredit
properties.Description: The total credit amount extended to the Customer as of the associated timestamp.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp for which the associated credit extended information is presented.

Columns.Name: TotalExtendedCreditAmount
Columns.Description:
The total amount of credit extended to the Customer as of the associated date.

'Period' credit can be averaged, meaned and calculated by using multiple dates.
